metadata.Title: CVE-2013-7343 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in flowplayer.swf in the Flash fallback feature in Flowplayer HTML5 5.4.3 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML by using URL encoding within the callback parameter name.  NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2013-7342.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
